name: Heroes City Superman Edition
description:
Are you ready for a unique experience where you can choose your own hero and have an adventure on a large realistically prepared map?
With heroes city, you can choose your hero and experience flight experience action.
Moreover big update coming soon!

they will be added in the big update
+Planes and helicopters will be added to the map
+All air, sea and land vehicles in the game will be drivable.
+Multiplayer feature
+so much to the sky if you rise You will be able to access space. different planets and space stations can be visited in space (for now only mars and moon)
+Multi-language support
+New character animations
+FPS feature
+Missions will be added
+Motorcycles and boats will be added to the map
+New menu design and interfaces will be added
+Character outfit customization (civilian clothes will be wearable)
+Time stop feature will be added
+Fly speed sensitivity can be adjusted
+Morning evening cycle and different weather conditions will be added
+Optimization will be better








Realistic Graphics
The game was developed and continues to be developed with the unreal engine game engine.
The graphic possibilities offered by unreal engine for games are quite high.
Unreal engine was used for heroes city superman edition.

Realistic Sound Effects
While making the necessary adjustments in the game, we paid attention to make the sound effects feel like a real flight. Our aim was to provide the closest feeling to real life.
we worked especially hard on wind sounds

Character Animations
You can switch to different flight animations when you press the 1 and 2 keys while flying in the game.
We will improve these animations over time. More flight animations will be added to the game at a later time.
